abstract.t: Status Attestation is a signed object that demonstrates the validity status of a digital credential. These attestations are ephemeral and periodically provided to holders, who can present these to Verifiers along with the corresponding digital credentials. The approach outlined in this document makes the verifiers able to check the non- revocation of a digital credential without requiring to query any third-party entities.
